website_summaries.verdict: An everyday-use shampoo with natural ingredients that help keep hair healthy by supplying powerful nutrients and ingredients.
pros: A unique combination of ingredients that promote hair growth, shine, and healthy skin underneath
Doesn't leave any residue after rinsing in the shower
cons: Premium price tag for an everyday shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent product — DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Side by side against a bottle from an authorized salon — not the same thing. @Amazon — please stop authorizing sale of knock off product like this.
customer_reviews.author: g gerasimos

customer_reviews.title: Possibly not legit products
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel like this is a legit Bumble & Bumble product. As a long time user of this brand, these bottles were very slightly different from standard and the quality of the shampoo/conditioner was much more runny. I will be contacting Amazon and Bumble and Bumble to investigate further.
customer_reviews.author: C Romero

customer_reviews.title: Watered down product
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a large bottled of this. I love the product, this was my second time ordering it! But this bottled was totally watered down! I realized it after receiving a new bottled! It seems this vendor did that.
customer_reviews.author: sita levy

customer_reviews.title: I've used this shampoo for years and love it. The reason that I have it less ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shampoo for years and love it. The reason that I have it less than 5 stars is that the shampoo in my most recent bottle was like water instead of its usual thickness. I don't know if they changed the formula or if it was a bad shipment. In either case, I'm wary of buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Girl Grunt

customer_reviews.title: not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: my salon used to use this shampoo and it was wonderful smelling and lathered well. This IS NOT the same product. you have to use a whole lot of shampoo to get lather even on very short hair. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: carol s

customer_reviews.title: Adds Volume and Body to Hair without Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. My hair had lost all body and volume over the years. Regular shampoo only flattened my hair. Bumble and Bumble Seaweed Shampoo has given new life to my hair, body, volume and given me a lift to my spirits!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo for daily use, very light and color friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Clveazey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shampoo. It is light and leaves no buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I really couldn't tell a difference in my after even after weeks of use
customer_reviews.author: Headley

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bumble and Bumlble shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shampoo, smells great, cleans great. I wouldn't use for every shampoo though, may be too stripping, for my thinning, color-treated hair.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa26

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a NYC hairdresser
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a NYC hairdresser, I purchased this & it's perfect for not only color treated hair but for those of us with thin, fine hair. Not chemically harsh & helps to preserve & prolong next tint apptmt. The conditioner is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Punkie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for oily scalp. A little pricy for the amount of product but it does control my oily hair problem.
customer_reviews.author: S Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: This is the only B & B product I have used that is less than stellar. The shampoo leaves a,sticky clumpy feeling and my hair is not clean. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for color treated hair
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well and rinses quickly. Great for color treated hair.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lamont

customer_reviews.title: shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was awful,and the writing on the bottle was damaged. The UPC code has been rubbed off. It doesn't affect the product which I like, but, I will not buy from this seller again. This product is for oily hair. It leaves my hair too dry if I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: P. Larr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The product works great for my hair and never leaves any residue. I am religious about keeping my hair healthy and free of unnatural products that are damaging, and this product makes that possible.
customer_reviews.author: slee12.sl

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Great shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: It is a small bottle for the price. I noticed the larger bottle after I placed this order. Happy with shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Constance M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets hair super clean while gentle on colored hair; great lather and light pleasant scent; love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lyon

customer_reviews.title: expensive, but great
customer_reviews.text: I always manage to fint the best items on Amazon. This is one of them.But I'm sure there has to be a less expensive shampoo just as good! I'll keep looking. Remember, this price is for 8 ounces!!
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing and effective, I especially like this shampoo because it's not too fragrant. I recommend it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: illustrator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my sensitive skin and makes my hair highlights shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For frequent shampooers
customer_reviews.text: I wash my hair frequently & don’t want to use stronger shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clean 'n light
customer_reviews.text: Bumble and Bumble Seaweed Shampoo is perfect for my hair, which is shoulder-length, fairly thick, and colored. The shampoo cleans thoroughly and rinses well, leaving no residue. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kaki Ann

customer_reviews.title: good for the  hair
customer_reviews.text: this seawood shampoo is the best - it leaves the hair healthy and full. it arrived sealed good so no leakage from bottle. give it a try and about 7-10 days you notice and see a difference - and the smells good too...
customer_reviews.author: David b Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo we have found for oily hair - leaves it clean & no flakes - will continue to purchase this item
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed in this shampoo and the conditioner that went along with it. Not sure which one was worse, but I showered one night and woke up the next morning to find my hair appearing more greasy than it probably would have been if I had not showered at all. It was horrible. It was entirely too expensive to have this issue. Will not recommend to others or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo, it has a nice mild smell and lathers up well. It is a bit runnier than in stores and I don't think I will purchase it from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: themrsholt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. As I age, my hair is getting more dry and my scalp gets itchy with strong shampoos. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! Fabulous scent and cleans without drying!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deep cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo foams up nicely and smells good. It gets your hair squeaky clean without drying it out. This is a good shampoo for removing product buildup. I always follow this with a rich conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Amylicious

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service will be ordering more products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff - Ignore the Seaweed
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for fine hair. Cleans w/o stripping and leaving dry. Hair is fuller and soft. Plus, nice scent. Though I do occasionally wonder about the kind of mind that would consider that washing your hair with seaweed might be a good thing ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband; I love how it smells, cleans hair nicely, great! I always like BB products and this one doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Devlieg

customer_reviews.title: Lathers and cleans hair well
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but not the right kind for my curly and dry hair. It was a little expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: this is a good shampoo but was not the one i was looking for b & b seaweed shampoo with sea silk extract
customer_reviews.author: R. fakler

customer_reviews.title: Good product, leak in transit
customer_reviews.text: The product was great but the cap had loosened in transit so it leaked a little, not enough to return but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Form over Function
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be popular with young girls right now and it smells great. However it doesn't work all that well and we switched back to the tried and true brands.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great on sensitive scalps!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only shampoos I can use! I have very sensitive skin, and in the past had to change shampoo after 2-3 months of use as I'd develop sensitivity. I can't use moisturizing shampoos or conditioners at all, and clarifying shampoos overly dry my hair. I've been using BnB Seaweed for several years now. It's a basic, cleansing shampoo. If you have sensitive skin, give this one a shot. I promise it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: C. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has greasy hair because I read that it gets rid of oily hair. It didn’t. It also doesn’t advertise to. With that being said, the scent is ok, I didn’t really feel like it cleaned my hair that great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. Its a great simple shampoo for people who do not need anything fancy. I do realize that this shampoo is on the higher price side, but I tend to get a lot of build up on my head. And this shampoo helps to keep the build up down. So I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, what a letdown
customer_reviews.text: I can count on my hair looking awful when I wash it with this shampoo, so I only use it on days I don't care what I look like. it leaves my hair flat, without sheen and completely without body. I really looked forward to trying it -- I've read about this brand for years -- and I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help control my oily hair. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help control my oily hair. After a week of daily use, I have not seen any difference. For the price, I would expect to see some results.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have a brand that was wonderful and trying to find it. But this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Rae Walls

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo is very good. I have a difficult time finding a shampoo ...
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is very good. I have a difficult time finding a shampoo that doesn't dry out my hair and isn't too heavy. This is a very goos everyday shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Janine Boulad

customer_reviews.title: B & B Seaweed Shampoo has been one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: B & B Seaweed Shampoo has been one of my favorites for a long time. Wish it still came in a travel size.
customer_reviews.author: gale mendes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I also rated the shampoo and would only change the scent but not the brand. Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sherbondy

customer_reviews.title: lovely product
customer_reviews.text: smells awesome, it's pretty lightweight which i need for my hair and... well what can I say? Bumble and Bumble's products are excellent and always worth their price
customer_reviews.author: MissKikiPants

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and soothes scalp
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. It really does make the hair softer and fuller. It also cleans well and stays clean for a long time. Most shampoos make my scalp itch but this one did not. I note some people put off by the smell but I find it leaves quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: A great shampoo product
customer_reviews.text: Bumble and Bumble makes very good quality hair products. This seaweed shampoo is our preferred shampoo. It makes our hair feel clean and smell good. It is a little pricey but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. The product is great but it's a bit too expensive - that is why I am not giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Real Clean
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this very often, just as a break from my silver-color shampoo; it does keep my scalp from drying out and doesn't hurt my hair
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: B&B shampoo
customer_reviews.text: We either use B and B or Aveda both of which are good. This is the best one I have found since the Sap Moss shampoo was deleted by Aveda
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I find this shampoo drying and i have oily hair. I will not be buying this product again. Not enough moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has saved my hair from falling out. My hair feel cleaner and has volume. Would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: CocoD1

customer_reviews.title: love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect shampoo. Leaves hair clean and soft. Great for the scalp. I will order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem the same as the salon grade quality I have purchased in the past
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie DiGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Used together with the seaweed conditioner, this shampoo is as good as it gets. It cleans your hair without drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: jack f.

customer_reviews.title: Love Seaweed shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: The best shampoo !!!...Makes my hair feel so clean love the scent !!....Love all Bumble & Bumble products... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo that cleans a man's hair in not time ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shampoo that cleans a man's hair in not time and leaves it fresh and not oily. Just as I read about this product in Men's magazine that recommended it, I thought I give it a try and I am very happy with this shampoo. Just what a man needs to keep his hair clean, if you are active and shower everyday.
customer_reviews.author: MarkSme

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shampoo, does not let my hair get oily :)
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!!!!!!!! This shampoo is the best one ever! I have super oily hair and when I wash my hair with the Seaweed Shampoo and conditioner I can easily stay 2 days without washing my hair and it does not get oily! Also it is super gentle on the hair and scalp. I guess I've found my shampoo and conditioner :)
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this shampoo many years ago and have never found an equal. It thoroughly cleans my hair without drying it out and leaves a nice texture. I have tried others but I always come back to B&B Seaweed Shampoo and its companion conditioner. It is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expensive but so nice
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Bumble & Bumble at my sister's in Maine. Plus, my son-in-law's sister is a hair salon owner in Tahoe and she uses Bumble & Bumble. Smells divine. Cleans the hair. Adds to the shower experience. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: miasarx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fine shampoo for years. I've tried others, but have never found another product that does such a thorough job. It even comes in a small size for travel. The conditioner is equally good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bumble and Bumble Seaweed Shampoo 8.5 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
New Therapies For Hair And Scalp.
-
Addresses Major Problems Including Chemically Treated, Dry, Dull, Thinning Hair, And Flaky, Irritated Scalp.
-
A mild, moisturizing, daily shampoo with marine extracts that feed roots, add shine and keep scalps happy.
feature_bullets: New Therapies For Hair And Scalp.
Addresses Major Problems Including Chemically Treated, Dry, Dull, Thinning Hair, And Flaky, Irritated Scalp.
A mild, moisturizing, daily shampoo with marine extracts that feed roots, add shine and keep scalps happy.
